item.geriorandomstuff.sambadejaneiro.des: BASS FIST! feat. BOOGIE GIRL - SAMBA DE JANEIRO
fluid_type.geriorandomstuff.plasma.desc: A literal Plasma that is somehow in a liquid form and does not melt other things, and no, this is not a blood plasma.
hexcasting.mishap.divide_by_zero.malform: Attempted to create a malformed number
hexcasting.mishap.divide_by_zero.toolarg: Attempted to create a number past it's maximum
gui.geriorandomstuff.hex.unsupportedcont: Cannot decode Jump Iota, Unsupported Type
gui.geriorandomstuff.geriobook.hex.numer: What's that? It seems that we could write readable numbers, but why is the spell not known into the world? Anyways, it seems we could write the numbers more easily, but almost no one dared to write numbers that way, even legends. It is unknown this spell has it's name, so Let's call it "Archaeologist's Purification" for now.
It converts the desiginated digit patterns into number, but the numbers can't be rotated in any way. Why? It seems it will break readability.
This is where the digits should write. Why? It's pretty unknown, but for some reason it's very restrictive like china's writing system works.
That's the advanced digits works. If I write the number where it couldn't represent, nature will be angry. Too big and it will mishap too. Subject to be Unsupported Action Mishap.
gui.geriorandomstuff.geriobook.hex.super: It's like a slate, but it can literally hold anything casted from staff, but it kind of ignores mishaps. Why? I don't know, but at least we don't even need a Athena's Gambit. Unlike pedestals, these always tries to execute the iota, even if the iota can't be executed.
Bro, Why is so expensive to make!?
gui.geriorandomstuff.geriobook.hex.hyper: This one reads Cypher/Trinket/Artifact's Spell, Why I couldn't cast a greater spell just to read contents? For some reason, This can't be used on Focis, Slates, or anything, just this.
gui.geriorandomstuff.geriobook.hex.conti: This one reads Jump Iota, Why I couldn't cast a spell just to read contents? It handles Iris' Jump iota into readable symbols. Subject to be Unsupported Action Mishap.

Some extensions will add new types of Jump iota. If the one finds out that this is not possible to handle, it will mishap. Hermes' Gambit will return Iota lists, Thoth's Gambit will return The stack, Supplied Program, Iterators.
